General.Name: ACTEOS S.A
General.Description: ACTEOS S.A. designs, develops, integrates, and provides software and related services in the field of supply chain management in France, Germany, and Lebanon. It offers Acteos suite, which include forecasting and procurement system for forecast and point of sales/e-business procurement optimization services; transportation management system to organize and manage transport activities; and warehouse management system, a modular solution to manage customers' warehouses. The company also provides mobility, software as a service, hotline, technical project management, and consulting services. ACTEOS S.A. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Roubaix, France.

1.Name: Mr. Thomas  Felfeli
1.Title: Deputy Chief Exec. Officer of Commerce and Marketing
